recipesJson.name: Custard and Apple filling pie cavendish
recipesJson.author: spicygal
recipesJson.description: Week 21 Flavor-pro week of the year or year in mixing or whatever it's called challenge.  Custards - this one is basic and paired with apples and a little bit of crust and a bunch of cavendish which is a fav of mine.  I'm a relative newbie to mixing - just fyi to other newbies looking at recipes.

pageContext.name: Custard and Apple filling pie cavendish
